page.title: 18INFORMATION FROM SURVEY
page.content: The low value for textile workers (2%) and complete absence of coal miners are noteworthy in view of the town's industrial growth and development. Group 2 is largely represented by workers at Robertson of Springwells (Soft Drinks) and Marshall of Cambuslang (Poultry Processors), Group 4 by the British Steel Corporation's Ravenscraig Works at Motherwell, and Group 5 by Hoover of Cambuslang. However the pattern of employment is dominated by service industries, especially Group 10, owing to the recent arrival of an Asda superstore in the Blantyre. Many of the employment opportunities in Blantyre and the surrounding area are for female workers, and of a part_time nature.
